description.#text: Voicemail-to-Text Voicemail features provide voice messaging service to customers with voice plans.  The Voicemail to Text (VTT) feature provides voicemail messages in a text format for you to read. Compatible service and device required. ¿ A free 30 day VTT trial automatically included with first use of Visual Voicemail. ¿ You will be notified when the trial starts and when it is ending.

shortDescription.#text: Voicemail-to-Text Voicemail features provide voice messaging service to customers with voice plans.  The Voicemail to Text (VTT) feature provides voicemail messages in a text format for you to read. Compatible service and device required.

longDescription.descriptionText:
Voicemail features provide voice messaging service to customers with voice plans.  The Voicemail to Text (VTT) feature provides voicemail messages in a text format for you to read. Compatible service and device required.
You can add an email address on My T-Mobile. Once added, every time you get a voicemail it will automatically send a text and audio copy to your email inbox.
¿ A free 30 day VTT trial automatically included with first use of Visual Voicemail.
¿ You will be notified when the trial starts and when it is ending. If you do not add the paid service at trial end (from within the application settings, calling care or in a retail store), the service will end and you will not be charged.
¿ If you have the Communication Bundle feature, VTT is included with it along with Name ID.
VTT supports English and Spanish. Mixed language messages are not supported (such as message that contains both English and Spanish words)

description.#text: Web Guard ¿ Child (Ages 7 & up ) Web Guard is a free service (no usage appears on the bill) that allows the Primary Account Holder (PAH) to restrict access to adult Web content on the device with four different access levels. Add the Web Guard feature to customers who request it.

shortDescription.#text: Web Guard ¿ Child (Ages 7 & up ) Web Guard is a free service that allows the Primary Account Holder (PAH) to restrict access to adult Web content on the device with four different access levels.

longDescription.descriptionText:
Web Guard ¿ Child (Ages 7  & up)
Web Guard is a free service (no usage appears on the bill) that allows the Primary Account Holder (PAH) to restrict access to adult Web content on the device with four different access levels. Add the Web Guard feature to customers who request it.
Content in this category will be limited as follows:
Little or no sexual content
No strong language
No alcohol, tobacco or drug use
No gambling
No shopping
Some gaming
Web Guard is applied to all HTTP traffic.  Many applications use HTTP, which may cause some like Instagram to be blocked by Web Guard. Additionally, there is some content that cannot be blocked such as pre-installed applications or applications downloaded prior to the addition of the feature.
